channel.title: Runes For Magic?

item.title: Runes For Magic?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Uber Noob Question. But How Do I Add It So You Need Runes For Spells.
I Mean, On Alch, I Did Fine…
But When I Try The Same Thing:

{ if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true)) {
and then continue with the spell… (obviously i changed the spell id, level needed, runes required.
but it gives me 100+ errors…

Help Please?

Read full topic
